points: Choose a programming language of your choice
Start studying data structures and algorithms

Identify your interests: 
	- Web Development,
	- ML,
	- Android development,
	- Cybersecurity,
	- Blockchain
Start by learning the basics of the domains of your interests
Try to build projects of your own and learn along the way
After gaining some experience, start applying for internships
Keep learning and keep building projects
Have a thorough knowledge of fundamentals - Mechanics, Thermodynamics, Mathematics, Fluid Dynamics, Materials, Energy Systems..
Learn design theory. Major topics include Design for Assembly, Design for Manufacture, Product life cycle, Prototying etc.
Start learning the basics of CAD. Practice 3D modelling, drafting and rendering.
Start learning the concepts of CAE - Computational Fluid Dynamics, Finite Element Analysis, Multibody Dynamics.
Learn about common components used in industry - Flow control, Heating & Cooling, Lifting & Pulling, Piping and Tubing and so on.
Develop your knowledge of manufacturing awareness - Cutting, Forming, Sawing, Material Selection etc.
Learn thesoft skills and develop the etiquette for working in the industry - Problem solving, Interview skills, Teamwork, Communication etc.

Develop a thorough understanding of the core subjects - Mathematics,Signals and Systems, Control Systems, Digital Electronics, Analog Electronics, Microprocessors, Microcontrollers, Power Electronics, Communications systems, etc.
Explore the various domains of electronics - VLSI, Embedded Systems, Robotics, Signal Processing, etc. Identify the one which aligns the most with your interests.
Apply for internships in the domain of your interest
